content: Black Myth: Wukong has a selection of different Drinks you can equip that change the Gourd’s behavior. From restoring your health quickly, restoring it over time, or in alternative ways, the drink options allow you to pick an option that suits your style.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Drinks.md', within the main section titled 'Drinks'.
The content is as follows:
Black Myth: Wukong has a selection of different Drinks you can equip that change the Gourd’s behavior. From restoring your health quickly, restoring it over time, or in alternative ways, the drink options allow you to pick an option that suits your style.
